name: WebXR - Red Light, Green Light
description:
Classic Red Light, Green Light game in WebXR.

Supports both AR and VR devices:

  • Android - Chrome and Samsung Internet.
  • Oculus Quest 1 and 2 - Oculus Browser.
  • Hololens 2 - Edge.
  • Windows Desktop - Chrome and Edge when a VR device is connected.

Instructions:

  • On VR devices with controllers, move the controllers up and down in different directions to run.
    Click trigger button to re-start the game.
  • On AR devices, when switching to AR mode position the start point, then run like your life depends on it.
    Tap the screen or do a click gesture to re-start the game.

Assets by Rzyas and C.K
